alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Northern Cayuga; Orleans; Wayne (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 5:25AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF LAKE EFFECT SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF ORLEANS...WAYNE... MONROE...AND NORTHERN CAYUGA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of lake effect snow will impact travel along the south shore of Lake Ontario early this morning, including the Rochester area. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...A band of lake effect snow will continue to drift slowly south along the south shore of Lake Ontario early this morning. the band will be briefly heavy, with visibility less than a half mile. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Rochester, Greece, Irondequoit, Brockport, Hilton, Webster, Fairport, Brighton, Gates, Ontario, Penfield, Newark, Williamson, Marion, Lyons, Spencerport, Palmyra and Clyde. This includes Interstate 90 near exit 40. This includes Interstate 390, 490, 590, and Route 104 in Rochester. SAFETY INFO...Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
